beer.beer_description: A kiss of sunshine, a whisper of the tropics, and a lingering taste of joy. Dry, clean, and hoppy, this East Coast IPA with a West Coast heart strikes the perfect balance, delivering a crisp, refreshing drop that lingers just right.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 70 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 15! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 25 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 370 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 75!

items.badge_description:
The beer style with the most annual check-ins definitely deserves its own party, dont you think?

In 2023, Sierra Nevada had the brilliant idea to create a day of celebration for hazies, and we gotta tip our cap to their brilliant idea! 

This year, were excited to introduce our second iteration of the Hazy IPA Day badge.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 405 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 82!

items.checkin_comment: Ultra hazy straw colour. Green and resinous with a slick mouthfeel. Has imperial boozy taste.

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 235 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 48! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Decent, fruity, tangy, it's nice but I feel like it needs something, bit of a metaphor for this brewery, they make good beers but could be better

user.bio: World traveller, brewery taproom seeker, music venue follower, sometimes all on the same day
